Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.rmi

Class ClientConnectionRMI

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.rmi.ClientConnectionRMI
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientConnection, ClientConnectionRMIInterface, Serializable, Remote
public class ClientConnectionRMI extends UnicastRemoteObject implements ClientConnection, ClientConnectionRMIInterface
Class representing an RMI connection on the client-side to the server.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientConnectionRMI

      public ClientConnectionRMI(UpdateViewInterface listener) throws RemoteException
      Constructs a new ClientConnectionRMI. It sets the listener of the network.
      Parameters:
      listener - The listener of the network.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - Rmi exception. It is the one thrown by the no-args constructor of UnicastRemoteObject.

    • scheduleTimers

      public void scheduleTimers()
      Schedules the timers to send and check for Beeps (heartbeats) periodically.
